This website contains the analysis of the quality of the current methods to gap fill meteorological data in the Eddy Covariance community.

Main analysis:

- [MDS Gap filling quality](MDS_gap_filling_quality.html) Gap filling using REddyProc
- [ERA Gap filling quality](ERA_gap_filling_quality.html) Gap filling using ERA data

Supporting analysis:

- [variable exploration](variable_exploration.html)  Exploration of variable distributions

Addition analysis:

- [MDS Gap filling quality_Hyy](MDS_gap_filling_quality_Hyy.html)  Gap filling using data from Hytiälä, instead of Hainich
- [MDS multiple_missing_gap_filling quality](MDS multiple_missing_gap_filling quality.html)
